item.title: MATH 324 Computer HW 1
item.description: Exercise 1: (a) Use c() to generate two datasets. modifiedMortar=c(16.85, 16.40, 17.21, 16.35, 16.52, 17.04, 16.96, 17.15, 16.59, 16.57) unmodifiedMortar=c(16.62, 16.75, 17.37, 17.12, 16.98, 16.87, 17.34, 17.02, 17.08, 17.27) (b) Use mean() and median() to calculate the mean and median of each dataset. mean(modifiedMortar) ## [1] 16.764 median(modifiedMortar) ## [1] 16.72 mean(unmodifiedMortar) ## [1] 17.042 median(unmodifiedMortar) ## [1] 17.05 (c) Use sd(), var() and IQR() to calculate the sample standard deviation, sample variance and IQR of each dataset.
